s.text: He quoted one Israeli official as saying that Israel hopes Hassan will succeed because he is not only deeply committed to the peace process but is also "a person of vast experience."

24 meeting will issue a "balanced" statement opposing fresh U.S. strikes against Iraq and also coming out against assistance to the Iraqi opposition in its goal of bringing down Saddam.

In the Jerusalem Post , David Newman wrote Wednesday that King Hussein was seen "not only as an Arab leader who made peace, but also as one who believes in that peace and, who is prepared to come and visit the parents of schoolchildren killed by his border guards, as a person who has really had enough of war and bloodshed."
